entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Snow mixed with rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
